original_title: Who Pays the Price? The Human Cost of Electronics
overview: This short documentary reveals the hazards of the electronics industry in China profiling workers poisoned by chemicals and their struggle for compensation.  Thousands of young people in China enter export factories to make the West's favorite electronic gadgets, only to find they have contracted occupational diseases or worse, leukemia, by the age of 25.
title: Who Pays the Price? The Human Cost of Electronics
